elements.text:
During today's meeting, you have to present in front of your colleagues and boss. You've been struggling to put this presentation together, but you haven't reached out to your boss about it yet. 

Here are some thoughts that might pop into mind:

text: I won't perform my best today, but I'm allowed to have an off day sometimes.
I am hardworking, and my boss will be able to tell.
My colleagues will think that I prepared well for the presentation.
My job will be at risk if I mess up this presentation.
My boss will think that my presentation needs improvements, and I'll be OK with that.
